评论详情: This shirt is great. It is very flattering for women (not boxy). The material is cool and light. Color is great. I highly recommend and just ordered more. True to size.

I'm 5'3 and it's a hair long so keep that in mind if you prefer shorter shirts.  Color is pretty bright, maybe a little brighter than the photo but I love it

评论概述: Great fabric, great prints and colors.Sizes, inconsistent
评论详情: I ordered this shirt in a solid color and loved the fit.large was suggested and fit loose but comfortable. I ordered 2 more size Large  in prints, and they were bigger, all the way around bigger arms, bigger chest longer length, so I returned them.

This top is everything you could ask for, comfortable, wicking, stylish. and well made.  I'm  5'2" and curvy.  prefer loose tops, expecially in my tummy area.  I typically order an XXL.  I always have to shorten sleeves on long sleeve tops, or just scrunch them up, which you can do with this top.  It's super stretchy.  I LOVE  the fit.  I'm always looking for tops that are easy care, comfy, loose, and also cover my butt and crotch.This one does exactly that and has a bit of a slimming effect.  It's perfect with tight pants and leggings.  Patterned stitching on the front of the top and a zipper at the neck add to the overall attractiveness of the garment and elevate it from being just another athletic top, to one that really looks great.  Great travel item, easy to pack and doesn't wrinkle.  I plan to order this in more colors!

Nice fabric and wrinkle free. I plan to wear these tops with my leggings once the weather gets cooler. They are a little too warm for me wear now here in South Florida as the fabric is a little thick. I am really pleased with the polished style and upgrade to my leggings making it look as though you are wearing a coordinated  outfit. There were listed at a special discount when I purchased them making them a great bargain!

I will probably buy one or two more in different colors
